data.title: KNOWLEDGE + SKILLS
questions: In this phase, get to know the person and what they bring to the table.
Tell me about yourself. What got you here?
Given what you know about the job, what are your most relevant skills/strengths?
What specific knowledge areas and expertise do you bring to the role?
What knowledge could you share with the team?
What skills do you want to develop?

data.title: HOPES + DREAMS
questions: In this phase, get the person to share their hopes and dreams in the role.
What drew you to this role?
What are you most curious about?
How do you learn best? Reading, studying, listening, or just doing?
What do you aspire to do professionally? What’s a dream of yours?
How do you see this role helping your career?
What’s your ‘gut’/intuition about this job?

data.title: VALUES + MOTIVATIONS
questions: In this phase, try to understand their values, motivations and de-motivators.
What qualities are you most proud of?
What matters most to you? What do you value most?
What matters to you on a team? Or in the people you work with?
Tell me about a time when you were very motivated… (listen for intrinsic motivators)
What within you motivates you to do/perform your best?
Tell me about a time when you were very demotivated… (listen for extrinsic de-motivators)
What circumstances do you think caused or contributed to that?
What are you most interested in? Passionate about?

data.title: GOALS + PLANS
questions: In this phase, ensure the person is clear about their role, goals and near-term plan.
How clear is your role? What’s expected of you? What can I clarify?
What’s your near-terms plan? First steps?
What goals/targets have you set for yourself?
How can I help you achieve your goals?
How often shall we touch base on your goals?

data.title: ME AS a LEADER
questions: In this phase, share openly about yourself as a leader.
What would you like to know about me?
Here’s what matters most to me: (values, beliefs, principles)
Here’s my philosophy of leading: (style, ethics, code of conduct)
Here are my pet peeves: (e.g., surprises, being late, not asking for help, etc.)
Here’s what you can count on from me: (support, fairness, transparency)
What else would you like to know?
